summary: Diff removes the wallpaper control from the Header and adds a mount-time localStorage cleanup for a wallpaper key, but wallpaper-related modules still exist and additional unrelated UI interactivity guard/CSS changes were introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Disable applying and rendering a custom wallpaper background across the app layout, including clearing any previously persisted wallpaper in localStorage so older wallpapers do not continue to appear.

missing_requirements.requirement: Clean up unused wallpaper-related frontend code and styles after the feature is removed (components, hooks, and CSS) to avoid dead code and unused Tailwind/CSS selectors.
missing_requirements.reason: Wallpaper-related files are still present and were modified rather than removed; without their contents it is not evident that the wallpaper feature code paths were fully deleted or that these modules are no longer dead code.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which focuses on removing wallpaper UI/behavior and cleanup).
